summary: Applied AI engineer with experience building production ML systems, embeddings pipelines and MLOps tooling.

responsibilities: Designed and deployed vector search and embedding pipelines for product search using FAISS and OpenAI/Gemini embeddings.
Built end-to-end data ingestion, training and inference orchestration with CI/CD and monitoring.
Reduced inference latency 40% via model distillation and batching.
Implemented NLP pipelines for named-entity extraction and intent classification for enterprise customers.
Improved model F1 by 12% through feature engineering and curriculum training.

projects.title: Total-Recall (QA over Docs)
projects.description: Built a document question-answering system using embeddings + RAG with a streaming UI.

projects.title: AtariTrainer
projects.description: RL research project training agents on Atari with PyTorch.
